price: 104. Tama korosuy Yalli calalloysem carammossak Yalli oobisem kee Yallih farmoytâ fanah calaalii kee caraamu Baxxaqqa siinih haamkeh Ama keenik iyyeenik tamah nanu Nabbobtik nagarreeh ken elle geyneemiy nee xiqta kinni iyyan, ken Abbobti cakki Aaxige waytaah cakkit Rada mага akke waan wayaa? Usun woh iyyaanam.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ قَالُواْ حَسۡبُنَا مَا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum taʿālaw ilā mā anzala al-lahu wa-ilā al-rasūli qālū ḥasbunā mā wajadnā ʿalayhi ābāanā awalaw kāna ābāuhum lā yaʿlamūna shayan walā yahtadūna
